abstract: Man who targets middle-aged members of Delta Sigma Theta sorority has sexually assaulted four women in Dallas area since November 2010.
snippet: A man appears to be targeting the middle-aged members of Delta Sigma Theta, sexually assaulting four women in the Dallas area since November 2010.
lead_paragraph: A man appears to be targeting the middle-aged members of Delta Sigma Theta, sexually assaulting four women in the Dallas area since November 2010.

headline.main: In Dallas Area, 4 Attacks Linked by Victims’ Sorority Membership
headline.print_headline: In Dallas Area, 4 Attacks Linked by Victims’ Sorority Membership
